about.heading: AI Nike Chan
about.greeting: "Hello, my name is Nike. What's your name?"
about.description:
AI Nike Chan loves new things and is curious about everything.
She's still learning, but that means her potential is limitless.
Your chats, illustrations, and videos shape who she is.
Why not join us in expanding her world?

items.title: Added Image & Video Generation Tutorial Page
items.description: We've published step-by-step instructions for easily generating images and videos of AI Nike Chan.

items.title: New Voice Synthesis Model Completed
items.description: We've created a new voice synthesis model for AI Nike Chan. Please watch the debut MV.
items.embedTitle: New Voice Synthesis Model Debut MV

items.title: Derivative Creation Guidelines Published
items.description: We've published guidelines for creating derivative works of AI Nike Chan. This covers rules for creating and distributing fan art and AI-generated works.

license.heading: Generative AI Usage OK!
license.description: Nike Chan's VRM model can be used with generative AI, including i2i and LoRA creation. You can use it for a wide range of purposes such as creative work, research, and streaming, in accordance with our guidelines.
license.disclaimer: Some uses may be subject to conditions. Please check the guidelines for details.

example.heading: Example: i2i with nano banana
example.prompt: Please redraw this girl in a punk rock style design.

fanbox.heading: Support via FANBOX
fanbox.description: Your support will be used for ongoing activities and production costs. All support plans offer the same benefits - no difference based on amount.
features: Same Benefits: All plans have the same content
Currently, payments are consolidated to FANBOX

discord.heading: About Discord
discord.description: Sponsors can join special Discord channels. However, our basic policy is to make information public and minimize exclusive content.
discord.featuresHeading: What you can see in public channels (examples)
features: More to be added as needed
discord.disclaimer: Detailed participation instructions and channel structure will be provided in the special Discord channels.

email.label: Email
email.description: Email contact is currently being prepared. Please contact us via Twitter (X) or Discord for now.
